Text.Value: Coming around, are we? I think there's some left.
A wise request, and a timely one. The ointment isn't protecting anyone if it isn't applied.
|Karla has ointment applied and reacts to other wanting it!|
|Laezel has ointment applied and reacts to other wanting it!|
|SH has ointment applied and reacts to other wanting it!|
|Wyll has ointment applied and reacts to other wanting it!|
Check the bags - I think there's some left.
It is dark out here. Perhaps a little ointment wouldn't hurt.
On seconds thoughts, might I have some of that ointment? One can never be too protected from evil curses, in my experience.
|Karla asks for ointment!|
|Laezel asks for ointment!|
|Wyll asks for ointment!|
I have not applied the ointment. Now seems an opportune time.
Here we go - if there's any of that ointment left, I could use it.

EditorData.logicalname: Not SH, doesn't have ointment status

Text.Value: |Can I get some ointment after all?| [Shadowheart-specific node, as she might have opinions about an ointment of Selûne.]

EditorData.logicalname: SH doesn't have the ointment status

Text.Value: Better late than never, I suppose.
The ointment is there to be used. We should all share in its protection.
|Karla has the ointment applied and comments!|
|Laezel has the ointment applied and comments!|
|SH has the ointment applied and comments!|
|Wyll has the ointment applied and comments!|
Better to use it now than not use it at all.
Just leave a little for the rest of us.
I'll take some, if there's any to spare. One can never be too protected against curses, I find.
|Karla doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|Laezel doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|SH doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|Wyll doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
I hope there's enough to go around.
Let's just go. They'll probably be fine.
Better to apply it now, than risking the path ahead without the ointment's protection.
|Karla has the ointment applied and comments!|
|Laezel has the ointment applied and comments!|
|SH has the ointment applied and comments!|
|Wyll has the ointment applied and comments!|
We all should have applied it earlier.
Really? You won't burst into flames or anything?
Shar and Selûne are but two sides of the same coin. One's help is as good as the other's.
|Karlach reacts to SH of all people wanting Ointment of Selûne|
|Laezel reacts to SH of all people wanting Ointment of Selûne|
|Wyll reacts to SH of all people wanting Ointment of Selûne|
Of course, Selûne protects all who ask.
A change of heart? Good for you.
True, a little extra protection wouldn't hurt.
I may join you. I'm not sure I want to brave what's ahead without the ointment's protection.
|Karla doesn't have the ointment applied and reacts to the other wanting it!|
|Laezel doesn't have the ointment applied and reacts to the other wanting it!|
|SH doesn't have the ointment applied and reacts to the other wanting it!|
|Wyll doesn't have the ointment applied and reacts to the other wanting it!|
Same here. I don't want to face whatever's out there unprotected.
It's only cursed, murderous darkness. How bad could it be?
I'll take some, if there's any to spare. One can never be too protected against curses, I find.
|Karla doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|Laezel doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|SH doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
|Wyll doesn't have the ointment applied and comments!|
I'm not worried - I made it this far without magic ointment.

Synopsis:
PAD where a character who doesn't have the ointment applied steps into the shadowcurse and considers applying some. 
Only triggers if someone has spare ointment in their inventory. (At least one application)
Plays only if 2 or more characters present: first to speak doesn't have the ointment applied on them. SH speaks first if she can.
WRITER, don't forget to update the voicebark file SCL_ShadowCurse_VB_WantsOintment if you change the structure here!
